lyrics:
34 contributorstranslationsespañolportuguêsall i need to hear lyricsverse 1
i get out my records
when you go away
when people are talking
i miss what they say

chorus
cause it all means nothing my dear
if i cant be holdin you near
so tell me you love me
cause thats all that i need to hear

verse 2
i sit in my kitchen george do the hihats now
with nothing to eat
with so many friends i
i dont wanna meet

chorus
cause i dont need music in my ears
i dont need the crowds and the cheers
oh just tell me you love me
cause thats all that i need to hear

bridge
ive been told so many times before
but hearin it from you means much more
so much more
see the 1975 liveget tickets as low as 8you might also likeverse 3
reply to my message
and pick up my calls
you see i wrote you a letter
it was no use at all

chorus
oh i dont care if youre insincere
just tell me what i wanna hear
you know where to find me
the place where we lived all these years oh
and tell me you love me
thats all that i need to hear
oh tell me you love me
thats all that i need to hear7embed
